name: Old Fashioned
description: The Old Fashioned is a cocktail made by muddling sugar with bitters, adding whiskey, garnished with a citrus rind
directions: In a Low-ball Glass Place one large ice cube.
Then add 1/4oz of simple syrup, 4-6 Dashes of Bitters of your choice.
Last but not least 2-4oz of whiskey for a true old-fashioned use Rye Whiskey.
For a less traditional version use Bourbon.
Once all in the glass gently stir till combined.
